text: Agile IT infrastructure, or Agile Infrastructure for short, is an emerging type of IT infrastructure that goes beyond Hyper-converged infrastructure and puts emphasis on * speed of implementing change, * reducing complexity, * resilience, * quick adaptation to new technologies, * taking advantage of lightweight deployment options, * easy accessibility of management tools and * making everyone heroes, not just a few individuals. ==References== Category:Infrastructure Category:Computing_platforms Category:Information_technology
title: Agile infrastructure
